column5: Talking to a fellow and relayed this to me. A couple of guys were out on Wasi Lake fishing with too many lines. They seen a CO coming and cut the extra lines off. Noting the holes with no ice in them asked about the possibility of using too many lines. They told the usual lies. The CO pulls out a magnet on a line and drops it down the hole. Pulls up 2 lines with live minnows. Explain that he says. Hmmmm. They were charged.  No sympathy here.
good to hear!!!  Thats a nice little lake, glad to hear that its being patrolled!  Cheers!
Never understood it, you want to play the game? follow the rules!
Great to hear Bernie... Glad they didn't get away
Good to hear that Bernie. When did CO start carrying magnet? Never heard of that one.
Sweet...  they all carry magnets.. at least the ones here do!!
Glad I packed all them aluminum spoons for Thursday!
This is good news.  Thx for sharing.
I heard he has one of those newfangled aluminum magnets.
What?  He didnt swim for em?!!  LOL  Right on.  Exactly the kind of CSI we'd expect from our men in green.  My kind of dude.  cheers HD
hope he charged them with making a false statement as well......  Looks good on them!!  Sinker
Its nice to see idiots like that get nailed. Hopefully our court system wont mess up when it comes to sentancing/fining them.
Idiots. I never use live minnows on my cheater lines.
They should have asked to CO to see his license since he had a line with hook and minnow on it.....  Wonder if he found my sunglasses too?
glad to here there on the job.....we need them out there just for this reason.  Hawg Hunter
